    • Uses of ConfigurationOption in org.jboss.windup.config

      Classes in org.jboss.windup.config that implement ConfigurationOption 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractConfigurationOption
      Provides a base class for sharing default functionality between ConfigurationOptions.
      class  AbstractPathConfigurationOption
      Provides a base for validating ConfigurationOptions of type File.
      class  AnalyzeKnownLibrariesOption
      Option to force the analysis of already known libraries.
      class  KeepWorkDirsOption
      Indicates the Java packages for Windup to scan.
      class  SkipReportsRenderingOption
      Indicates whether Windup processing should render reports at all.

    • Uses of ConfigurationOption in org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Iterable<ConfigurationOption> WindupConfiguration.getWindupConfigurationOptions()
      Returns all of the ConfigurationOption in all currently available Addons.
      static Iterable<ConfigurationOption> WindupConfiguration.getWindupConfigurationOptions(org.jboss.forge.furnace.Furnace furnace)
      Returns all of the ConfigurationOption in all currently available Addons.

    • Uses of ConfigurationOption in org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration.options

      Classes in org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration.options that implement ConfigurationOption 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExcludeTagsOption
      Specifies the tags to be excluded during Windup execution.
      class  ExplodedAppInputOption
      Indicates that the input points to a directory with multiple applications rather than being an application itself.
      class  ExportCSVOption
      Indicates that windup should export the report into the csv file.
      class  IncludeTagsOption
      Specifies the tags to be included during Windup execution.
      class  InputApplicationName 
      class  InputPathOption
      Specifies the Input path for Windup.
      class  OnlineModeOption
      Indicate that network related actions are allowed (they should be disabled by default).
      class  OutputPathOption
      Indicates that output path for the windup report and other data produced by a Windup execution.
      class  OverwriteOption
      Indicates that Windup should overwrite the output directory if it already exists (without prompting).
      class  SourceOption
      Specifies the source framework or server to migrate from.
      class  TargetOption
      Specifies the target framework or server to migrate to.
      class  UserIgnorePathOption
      An option to specify file/directory that contain the regexes of file names to be ignored.
      class  UserLabelsDirectoryOption
      Indicates the file that will contain custom labels provided by the user.
      class  UserRulesDirectoryOption
      Indicates the directory or directories that will contain rules provided by the user.
